trans-unit.source: Provides a XAML-friendly implementation of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref> that filters on a single action.
trans-unit.target: 提供的 XAML 易記實作<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref>單一動作篩選。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.target: 動作<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> is equal to the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否目前<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>是否等於指定<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>要與目前比較<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>是否等於目前<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 傳回雜湊碼<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 雜湊碼<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified message’s action matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*> of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的訊息動作是否符合<xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>這個<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 訊息的動作所指定的<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>訊息屬性的<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的訊息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action matches; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果比對的動作;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the action of the message contained by the specified message buffer matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*> of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的訊息緩衝區所包含之訊息的動作是否符合<xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>這個<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>

trans-unit.source: The message buffer that contains the message to compare.
trans-unit.target: 包含要比較之訊息的訊息緩衝區。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果比對的動作;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> representation of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>表示<xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A> property is set, its value is used to build the string representation; otherwise, the base class <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A>屬性設定，其值為用來建立字串表示; 否則基底類別<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>會傳回值。</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A>
